abilities.title: Infiltrate
abilities.text:
At the start of this Unit's activation, one allied Rebel Alliance character may . Defensive Maneuver Each character in this Unit may . If any characters , this Unit gains . Explosive Charge Choose an objective within 3. Each allied character within 2 of that objective may and gain . Then, each Unit within 2 of that objective suffers and removes any it has. Coordinated Fire: [exposed] When a character in another allied Rebel Alliance Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within 5 of a character in this unit, the target unit gains [exposed]. Unexpected Allies Allied Rebel Alliance Units have the Ewok Tag.
Allied Ewok Units have the Rebel Alliance Tag.
